tpk::FK5Target

tpk::FK5Target Class Reference

#include <FK5Target.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::FK5Target:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

FK5 target.

An FK5Target object represents a fixed position in the FK5

All the methods of this class are thread safe.

Public Member Functions

tpk::FK5Target::FK5Target ( const Site &  site,
const std::string &  starget 
)

Constructor with target specified as a string.

The target is assumed to be a star position specified as a free-format string.

Exceptions:
std::runtime_error 
Parameters:
site  telescope site
starget  target description
